SEARCH

Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
AbstractResource
Base of any resource found by AbstractResourceLocator.
AbstractResourceLocator
Base class to lookup resources somewhere, somehow.
BaseCompiler
Compiler implementation.
ByteArrayOutputStreamWithCallback
Specialized version of a ByteArrayOutputStream which will provide the created byte array to a callback when stream is closed.
ByteArrMapResourceWriter
A resource based on a Map of byte arrays.
ByteArrResource
Resource stored in a byte array.
CompileException
Exception thrown when compilation fails.
CompilerListener
This compiler listener collects compilation errors and compiler logs into the data structures provided to it during construction.
CompilerListener.Type
 
CompileUtil
Utility class for compilation tasks.
DiagnosticLocation
Class which contains Location information for listeners.
FallbackResourceLocatorInputJavaFileManager
JavaFileManager which will try two different other JavaFileManagers.
A given resources is first tried to get from the first given JavaFileManager.
If no result is found, the second JavaFileManager will be tried.
FileResourceLocator
A resource locator used for regular files.

This resource locator is capable of recursively traverse directories when the FileResourceLocator.locate(String, boolean) method is used.
FileResourceWriter
A resource writer which writes the resource content to file.
IResourceWriter
Base interface for all resource writers.
ResourceWriter are used to write any sort of resource to an OutputStream.
JavaFileLoader
Utility class that loads a java source from file, compiles it and returns the class object.
JavaFileManagerUtil
 
MapResourceLocator
 
PathResource
Resource based on a Path.
ResourceBasedJavaFileObject
Implementation of a JavaFileObject.
ResourceLocatorClassLoader
ClassLoader implementation which uses a AbstractResourceLocator to find classes.
ResourceLocatorInputJavaFileManager<M>
JavaFileManager implementation which uses a AbstractResourceLocator to find classes and resources.
RtCompilerRunner
Compile and execute a Java source file at run-time.
Requires a JDK to execute.
Returns 0 using System.exit() on success.
RtCompilerRunner.ReturnCode
Return codes of RtCompilerRunner.
RtCompilerUtil
Helper class to compile java sources.
RuntimeCompilerException
RuntimeException used when compiler fails.
